name: inpact-be
description: Backend for main inPact user application, not a landing page.

scripts.start: npm run build && clear && source config/local-config.sh && node build/index.js
scripts.test: npm run build && source config/local-config.sh && clear && sh ./setup-test-db.sh && cd ./src && jest --forceExit
scripts.coverage: npm run build && source config/local-config.sh && sh ./setup-test-db.sh && cd ./src && clear && jest --coverage --forceExit

author: P.A.Z.
